entry.title: interval
entry.content:
假设$a,b\in R$，并且$a<b$。
$[ a , b ] = \lbrace x \mid a \le x \le b \rbrace$
$( a , b ) = \lbrace x \mid a < x < b \rbrace$
$[ a , b ) = \lbrace x \mid a \le x < b \rbrace$
$( a , b ] = \lbrace x \mid a < x \le b \rbrace$

假设$a \in R$。
$[ a , +\infty ]= \lbrace x \mid a \le x \rbrace$
$( a , +\infty ]= \lbrace x \mid a < x \rbrace$
$[ -\infty , a ]= \lbrace x \mid x \le a \rbrace$
$[ -\infty , a )= \lbrace x \mid x < a \rbrace$
